title: About Me
intro: Hello! I'm a self-taught full-stack developer with three years of professional experience and six years of coding and scripting experience. I currently live in Houston, TX and have previously lived in Charleston, DC, and Stockholm.

education.text: I graduated from Clemson University with degrees in Microbiology and Genetics and have a formal background in biomedical research. I am a published author! Check out the work that I contributed to below:

passion: I'm passionate about leveraging technology to create value and foster a positive, driven environment. I'm always looking to improve my skills and build exciting projects.
personal: Beyond coding, I try to hit the gym as often as possible and enjoy cooking new meals. I also love exploring new restaurants—Houston definitely isn't a tourist destination, but it has one of the best affordable food scenes I've ever experienced.
website: This website is my space to de-stress through code. Production quality code doesn't exist here—It's mainly me experimenting with all the cool things I can do with React and Javascript. Also for anyone who stumbles upon this website it's a place where you can get to know me better!
